org.apache.logging.log4j.core.async

Interface AsyncQueueFullPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAsyncQueueFullPolicy, DiscardingAsyncQueueFullPolicy

    public interface AsyncQueueFullPolicy
    Policy for deciding whether to discard the event, enqueue it or log the event on the current thread when the queue is full.
    Since:
    2.6
    See Also:
    AsyncQueueFullPolicyFactory

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventRoute getRoute(long backgroundThreadId, Level level)
      Returns the appropriate route for the current log event, given the specified parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoute

        EventRoute getRoute(long backgroundThreadId,
                  Level level)
        Returns the appropriate route for the current log event, given the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        backgroundThreadId - the thread ID of the background thread. Can be compared with the current thread's ID.
        level - the level of the log event
        Returns:
        the appropriate route for the current event
